response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking out a muffin from the fridge. The robot now has a muffin in its inventory. The next step is to take out a chicken leg from the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out a muffin from the fridge
(3) Take out a chicken leg from the fridge
(4) Heat the muffin
(5) Heat the chicken leg
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take out a chicken leg from the fridge
    chicken_leg = registry(env,"chicken_thigh_86")
    EasyGrasp(robot, chicken_leg)
    donothing(env)
